title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
### 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor

#### Product Overview
Elevate your home decor with the stunning 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor. Designed with a unique "Circle on circles" pattern, these mirrors are not only functional but also add a touch of modern and artistic flair to your living space.

#### Key Features
- **Design:** Circle on circles
- **Decor Type:** Wall art
- **Set Includes:** 2 mirrors
- **Styling:** Free styling and combination with other wall art
- **Size:** Diameter with frame: 15.7 inches, Diameter mirror only: 10 inches
- **Frame Material:** Iron
- **Hanging Method:** Single screw for easy installation
- **Mirror Weight:** 2 lbs
- **Glass Quality:** High quality annealed glass with HD imaging, preventing warping and distortion
- **Frame Color:** Gold, between matte and bright
- **Versatility:** Matches various decoration styles and is suitable for living room, bedroom, bathroom, entryway, and office space
- **Combination Options:** Picture wall, above TV, with paintings, wall sculpture, candle sconces

#### Product Details
- **Package:** Decent package for safe delivery
- **Intended Use:** Decoration for various rooms including bedroom, living room, entryway, and bathroom

#### Why Choose These Mirrors?
- **Unmatched Style:** The "Circle on circles" design brings a unique touch to any room, perfect for those looking for modern and artistic decor.
- **High-Quality Glass:** HD imaging ensures sharp and clear visuals, while high-quality annealed glass prevents warping and distortion.
- **Easy Installation:** Simply hang them with a single screw for hassle-free setup.
- **Versatile Use:** These mirrors can stand alone or complement other wall art, creating a cohesive look in any space.
- **Durable and Lightweight:** Made of iron with a gold frame, these mirrors are both sturdy and easy to hang.

#### Ideal for
- Living Room
- Bedroom
- Bathroom
- Entryway
- Office Space

### Complement Your Space with the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Today!

---

*Note: Ensure the wall is appropriate for hanging heavy items before installation.*
